title: Rocket McGee: Avoiding Trouble
description: First in a planned series, Rocket McGee - Avoiding Trouble! introduces four well-schooled and well-traveled but lonely young people about 12 years old who forge a reluctant and rocky alliance in a perilous, high-tech adventure to save one of their parents. Along the way, they discover friendship, a place in the world, and the super-human power to work together. Written for kids aged 10 to 14.
author: Roan Reedling
